metadata.title: CVE-2019-16921 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel before 4.17, hns_roce_alloc_ucontext indrivers/infiniband/hw/hns/hns_roce_main.c does not initialize the resp datastructure, which might allow attackers to obtain sensitive information fromkernel stack memory, aka CID-df7e40425813.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
